title: Gone from knocking on the doors...
body:
... of silver 4 to cleaning the toilets of b3 in one devastating and frustrating month. 

Fml.

replies.body: Yeah I got demoted from S5 to B1 last week and it's actually so hard to get from Bronze to Silver twice.

Sometimes taking a break from S o l o Q life helps, chill on normal trying out new champs or focusing on what you can do better on your main. Figure out your game-play style and how you can use it to best effect the game and in what time window (ideally). Best of luck climbing the ladder
Yeah I feel you. I've dropped from Silver 1 to Silver 5. I've taken a bit of a break and am going to be rallying over the next week to see if I can make the climb to gold, haha.

Its frustrating because I get frustrated with my team for a less than good play and overcompensate and end up doing something ten times dumber than the action i was frustrated with my team mate for. 

4 weeks ago i was invincible, good streak of solid games, but over the last 2 weeks I've been struggling 1v1 against poros.

Yeah - its really easy to get into that mindset. The reality though, is that you'll tend to make a lot more progress if you focus on getting better at the game. Forget about the end result - the goal here is to get better and improve my skill. 

Ideally, rank is going to come with that. This is just my perspective though, I'm sure others have some great insight as well.
Yeah having written it out and heard some feedback i can see my head is in the wrong place for ranked right now. Might dip into something else for a few days.

No-one in the history of LoL has even managed to kill a poro, just like riven, and you dont feel bad when 1v1ing riven and losing, 
so dont feel bad ^^

i get where you're coming from tho :( at the end of last season i got to B1 which is the highest i have been, then when this season started i had the best provisionals i had had, and got placed in B4 the lowest rank i had ever been, then proceeded to lose the next 8 games in a row , we all have tough runs i guess, but i got my act together again (so far at least), and you will too. :)
Thank you for the encouragement â˜º
It will never make sense to me that days of grinding progress can be lost with 3 or 4 bad games.

Play some unothodox champ that is not respected or thought of as troll pick in bronze. Anivia, Karma, Aatrox, Zac, Zilean, champs that give you some leeway if you make a mistake, where you're team can react and get you out of sticky situation.
